text: @atrupar If you were thinking the trump response to the covid-19 crisis was bad, wait until you see the colorful cover page, tucked neatly into a very strong binder, compared to the stapled papers of Obama’s plan (no colorful pictures! Sad!). No comparison! I was wrong about you Trump!
